interpretation: The "bellhop bell" emoji represents the act of calling for attention or assistance. This card may indicate a need to communicate clearly and directly with others in order to get what you need. It may also suggest a desire to be taken care of or to delegate tasks to others. On a deeper level, this card can symbolize the power of intention and the ability to attract what you need through focused thought and action. Keywords associated with this card include: communication, assistance, delegation, intention, and manifestation.
